about_the_game:
Yummy Mahjong is a captivating game designed for enthusiasts of the Mahjong Connect genre. Each level presents players with a colorful array of delectable treats and goodies scattered across the playing field. The primary objective is to skillfully identify and collect identical pairs of these delightful items to clear the board.

KEY FEATURES
  • Mahjong Connect Gameplay: "Yummy Mahjong" offers the classic Mahjong Connect gameplay, where players must match identical pairs of treats by connecting them with a clear path that consists of no more than two turns.
  • Delicious Treats and Goodies: The game's charming theme revolves around delightful treats and goodies, creating a visually appealing and enjoyable experience for players as they progress through the levels.
  • Progressive Difficulty Levels: Players can challenge themselves with progressively more challenging levels. As they advance, the complexity of the puzzles increases, requiring strategic thinking and observation skills.
  • Hint and Shuffle Options: To assist players in tricky situations, "Yummy Mahjong" provides useful hints and the ability to shuffle the treats' layout, allowing players to overcome obstacles and continue their journey.
  • Engaging and Addictive: With its captivating gameplay and colorful design, "Yummy Mahjong" offers an engaging and addictive experience for both experienced Mahjong players and newcomers to the genre.

name: Yummy Mahjong

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: Yummy Mahjong is a Mahjong Connect game where players match identical pairs of treats to clear the board and advance through levels. Strategic choices are important, and hints and shuffling options are available for assistance. Enjoy the challenge of connecting goodies in this engaging adventure!
